languages.text:
Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

traits.locale_text:
Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their turn, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this round will cost 0 AP and will not count towards the attack limit per round.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

languages.text:
每当要塞世界的角色杀死敌人时，都会获得10层“全力开火”效果。当要塞世界的角色{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}的首次攻击有一定几率不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且不计入每回合的攻击次数限制。触发几率等同于<u>（“全力开火”层数）</u>%。
此效果触发之后，所有“全力开火”层数都会耗尽。
languages.original_text:
Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

traits.locale_text:
每当要塞世界的角色杀死敌人时，都会获得10层“全力开火”效果。当要塞世界的角色回合开始时，本轮的首次攻击有一定几率不消耗任何行动点数，且不计入每回合的攻击次数限制。触发几率等同于<u>（“全力开火”层数）</u>%。
此效果触发之后，所有“全力开火”层数都会耗尽。

languages.text:
Cada vez que un personaje de mundo fortaleza mata a un enemigo gana 10 acumulaciones de No dejes de disparar. Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, hay un <u>(acumulaciones de No dejes de disparar)</u> % de probabilidad de que el primer ataque de este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} cueste 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y no cuente para el límite de ataques del asalto.
Si el efecto se activa, se pierden todas las acumulaciones.
languages.original_text:
Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que un personaje de mundo fortaleza mata a un enemigo gana 10 acumulaciones de No dejes de disparar. Al principio de su turno, hay un <u>(acumulaciones de No dejes de disparar)</u> % de probabilidad de que el primer ataque de este asalto cueste 0 PA y no cuente para el límite de ataques del asalto.
Si el efecto se activa, se pierden todas las acumulaciones.

languages.text:
Jedes Mal, wenn ein Bollwerkwelt-Charakter einen Feind tötet, erhält er +10 Stapel „Nie das Schießen einstellen“. Zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} besteht eine Chance von <u>(Stapel von „Nie das Schießen einstellen“)</u> %, dass der erste Angriff dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet und nicht für das Angriffslimit pro Zug gezählt wird.
Löst dieser Effekt aus, gehen alle Stapel verloren.
languages.original_text:
Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

traits.locale_text:
Jedes mal wenn ein Bollwerkwelt-Charakter einen Feind tötet, erhält er +10 Stapel Nie das Schießen einstellen. Zu Beginn seines Zuges besteht eine Chance von <u>(Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen)</u> %, dass der erste Angriff dieser Runde 0 AP kostet und nicht für das Angriffslimit pro Runde gezählt wird.
Löst dieser Effekt aus, gehen alle Stapel verloren.

languages.text:
Chaque fois qu'un personnage issu d'un monde forteresse élimine un ennemi, il obtient +10 cumuls de Tirs ininterrompus. Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il a <u>(cumuls de Tirs ininterrompus)</u> % de chances que la première attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et qu'elle ne soit pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour.
Si cet effet se déclenche, tous les cumuls sont perdus.
languages.original_text:
Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois qu'un personnage issu d'un monde forteresse élimine un ennemi, il obtient +10 cumuls de Tirs ininterrompus. Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il a <u>(cumuls de Tirs ininterrompus)</u> % de chances que la première attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et qu'elle ne soit pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour.
Si cet effet se déclenche, tous les cumuls sont perdus.

languages.text:
При каждом убийстве врага персонаж с мира-крепости получает +10 уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил". В начале его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} с шансом <u>(число уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил")</u>% первая атака за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и не входит в лимит атак на ход.
При срабатывании эффекта персонаж теряет все его уровни.
languages.original_text:
Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

traits.locale_text:
При каждом убийстве врага персонаж из мира-крепости получает +10 уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил". В начале его хода с шансом <u>(число уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил")</u>% первая атака за раунд не требует затрат ОД и не входит в лимит атак на ход.
При срабатывании эффекта персонаж теряет все его уровни.

languages.text:
要塞惑星のキャラクターが敵を倒すたび、ネバーストップ・シューティングの+10のスタックを得る。彼らの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初で、<u>(ネバーストップ・シューティングのスタック)</u>%の確率でこの{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の最初の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費が0になり、それは各ターンの攻撃制限にカウントされない。
この効果が発動すると全てのスタックを失う。
languages.original_text:
Each time a fortress world character kills an enemy, they gain +10 stacks of never stop shooting. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is a <u>(stacks of never stop shooting)</u>% chance that the first attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per turn.
If this effect triggers, all the stacks are lost.

traits.locale_text:
要塞惑星のキャラクターが敵を倒すたび、ネバーストップ・シューティングの+10のスタックを得る。彼らのターンの最初で、<u>(ネバーストップ・シューティングのスタック)</u>%の確率でこのラウンドの最初の攻撃のAP消費が0になり、それは各ラウンドの攻撃制限にカウントされない。
この効果が発動すると全てのスタックを失う。
